data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coloma, Luis A., Duellman, William E., C, Ana Almendáriz, Ron, Santiago R., Terán-Valdez, Andrea, Guayasamin, Juan M. (2010): Five new (extinct?) species of Atelopus (Anura: Bufonidae) from Andean Colombia, Ecuador, and Peru. Zootaxa 2574: 1-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197448
